entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny this evening then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023
